task.title: How to reply to an email in Outlook.
task.shortdesc: In this task we will learn how to reply to an email using Outlook.

prereq.p: You need to have installed Outlook on your machine.

context.p: This task can help you to reply to different types of emails that you have received.

step.cmd: Select the email which you want to reply to.
Write down your email that you want to send.

result.p: The email to wchich you replied is sent corectly and successfully!

example.p: You can use this function when you want to reply to an email quickly!
